documents.document: Alright, it’s #FitFriday, my head is a mess, I'll go snowboarding.
@IwoJima_Blake @Eri_Mandarian Do you agree, Eri? Maybe we should add @Eboni_Uto to the conversation. It was her who received it, right? ;)

"Friendly fire".
Who did you think of after reading this?
Me? I totally thought of @Eri_Mandarian ;)
@Sam_Carter_88 @Eri_Mandarian @Fking_Lucca Merci, Sam. :) You can join the party in the evening if you want to.
@Sam_Carter_88 Does that mean I can blame it all on you then? ;)
@Sam_Carter_88 Because that’s life. Anything could happen (insert an Ellie Goulding song here).
@Sam_Carter_88 Provided no one runs, burns or starts the apocalypse, of course. ;)
@NvidaNoire @Fking_Lucca Merci. Time went by so fast...
@Fking_Lucca Aaaw damn. Alright. I'll come with the pink-hair-pen.
@Fking_Lucca And I just sneak in and steal some bites. Deal? ;)
@Sam_Carter_88 @Eri_Mandarian @Rose_Huettinger PS: Big party this saturday. You can join!
@Sam_Carter_88 @Eri_Mandarian @Rose_Huettinger Totally in again next week. But for now I am completely takeb by wedding preps.
@Fking_Lucca Rumor has it he took her home too. But I'm not the jealous type of person... (This may be a lie. Where is that bitch?!)
@Fking_Lucca I am mostly using him to feed me. So... ;)
Oh it’s tuesday, isn’t it? Any #TMI pre-wedding questions that are burning in your hearts? Let them out! See what happens. ;)
@Fking_Lucca Is that a saying or do you... I don’t know, need to pee on a bridge?
@Fking_Lucca Got a pickup-line in mind?
@Fking_Lucca Na, that chick's taken. Super obviously. I meant the brunette one at the end... take a look.
@Fking_Lucca Pssst. I think that chick at the bar just flirted with you...
Oh, look at you handsome... ;) Spending some #UsTime with @Fking_Lucca https://t.co/rRnp2LtwWk
#OpenInvite Want to celebrate with us? Then join the party this Saturday (3 PM EST | 9 PM CET) | Music by… https://t.co/c2wZrEm1Gv
@Fking_Lucca I ❤ you. #HeartEyesAndShit
@Fking_Lucca Hey... let's go out. Clear our minds from the big thing and just be... us? What do you say?
@Eboni_Uto I wouldn't answer such a deep question publicly on twitter. ;)
@Mattarias_King Bored? Hell no. I'm burning brightly these days.
Hey @Fking_Lucca... I found a bar. Wanna join? ;) https://t.co/EnMBqx2bct
@sayehbird Such a beautiful lady. #HeartEyes
@MathieuTvesk I can deal with it (which surprises me but that's a different story). The cold helps.
@DelphicSnake Alright. Hi. Who are you?
@NotThisReality We got fire in our blood. The ice is a... nice contrast. #MeltingSnow
Alright. I can deal with a hangover as I think about my vows... https://t.co/Nc3RCkYqkD
@MathieuTvesk Why are you even liking this, @Eri_Mandarian ?!
@NotThisReality I do not like the term, but yes... I think, yes. I don't remember every part of it...
@Mattarias_King I'd be bored so soon. ;)
Oh... my... head.

@Sinthelyr @PapyrusBooks Whoever places his ass on front of my face basically HAS to expect that.
Didn’t do it though. ;)
The ladies are too busy watching guys getting naked. I think one asked me to bite his ass. Literally? Not sure...
@Eri_Mandarian @Eboni_Uto @sayehbird @NvidaNoire @Rose_Huettinger I need something hard. And since Lucca is busy, I take the scotch.
@Eboni_Uto @Eri_Mandarian @sayehbird @NvidaNoire @Rose_Huettinger Is there a golden rule too? https://t.co/HETITz5NxZ

Alright, girls. I got ya. #IvysBacheloretteThing
https://t.co/4maTJgx9ne
@Rose_Huettinger I'm probably complaining on a high level...
@Rose_Huettinger My teeth hurt. Trust me... there is (!) a point where it’s too much cake.
@Rose_Huettinger Maybe I do. I had to try tons of cake though yesterday.
@Eri_Mandarian @Sam_Carter_88 Oh I really wished you were right. But the thought made me laugh. ;)
@IlanaValkhor Oh great... I can’t even write FIT right...
Time for #FirFriday or I won’t even fit into my dress next week...
@LMSayyadina Yes. It was a bad habit of mine for a while. Still good memories are proof of a good life.
@Horradorable ... coming back is much more painful. At least for me. It was.
@Fking_Lucca That dessert was more average but... ;)
There still are times I feel alone.
((Well then, happy birthday @MarkelSmythe! :) Thanks for revealing it ;) @SuitablyMasked))
@NotThisReality @Fking_Lucca It’s not your fault, dear. I'm... I'm sorry if I made you feel excluded. It wasn’t my intention.
@NotThisReality Well. Congratulations at least.
@NotThisReality It’s statements like this that make me want to cancel it all, kidnap @Fking_Lucca and just marry him in Vegas...
@NotThisReality Hm? What do you mean?
@NotThisReality Shave before eating, Asmo. Shave before eating! It’s a golden rule.
Hey people-we-invited-to-our-wedding. It'd be awesome to know your +1's in time. Remember: A bear eats more than a chicken. We need to plan.

@Fking_Lucca I imagined a threeway with that chick and you.
Wait. Did I write that here?
@Fking_Lucca Okay. That just made my brain tilt...
Let's dance outside in the snow, @Fking_Lucca – interested? ;) https://t.co/IRUoCWdqmU
((Is there anyone (maybe a radio DJ) able to help me with a little musical mash-up thing? 🐿))
@DariasMandarian @Catherin_Dupont Oh hell no...
@DariasMandarian @Catherin_Dupont Better get your suit ready and prepare Max for his big task.
@Eri_Mandarian @Fking_Lucca I do tolerate yours and D's too. Though you’re not making it easy for me ;)
@Fking_Lucca Only yours, babe. Only yours. 💋
@Fking_Lucca My phone protects me from emojis? I never knew I had such a great one ;) 💋
@Fking_Lucca This is a tweet with no content?
@Fking_Lucca Insert what?
@Fking_Lucca IKR?! Making snow angels being naked is so much fun ;) (#TMIwednesday)
@Fking_Lucca ... and snow ;)

@Sam_Carter_88 @Eri_Mandarian @Rose_Huettinger ... in Italy. Oh... I just noticed I forgot to have a bachelorette party...
Well. Happens.
@Eri_Mandarian @Sam_Carter_88 @Rose_Huettinger I am going to marry in... a bit more than a week. I'm stuck in preparations and already...
@Fking_Lucca Hear me purr... ;)
@Fking_Lucca I love that strong accent... which is weird. But it just is suuuper hot...
[Perfect timing for players on EU time. #JustSaying Join in!] https://t.co/GZhNu96bZO
@DariasMandarian @Rose_Huettinger @The_Boomster we're talking about porn?
Now we're getting serious. Invitations will be send out privately soon. Stay tuned ;) https://t.co/vUjddWjpHe
@HikariKenzaki ((Good luck! Does one wish good luck here? I hope so! 🍀))
One of these moments he makes me weak... hi, furure husband ;) @Fking_Lucca https://t.co/i47RU0Soip
@MathieuTvesk ((I had to check the PC version of the website too to find it at the bottom))
((I joined (with Ily or Jo). Will you?)) https://t.co/GZhNu96bZO

@Fking_Lucca ((YES PLEASE. ;)
I mean. I like to read about him.))
I am so much more than you'll ever know. And still there'll be nothing left but ashes when I am done with this world.
@NvidaNoire Oh gosh, it kinda stresses me out. I think it's been 63 times now that in my mind I thought about running off with @Fking_Lucca
Ain't that a perfect match? ;) Song & Picture & ... https://t.co/g9Gmd3R9rQ https://t.co/2fAZOJV1v8
@NvidaNoire Your girlfriend? Seems like I missed a few things. I'm pretty well. Can't actually complain.
@MathieuTvesk @AnicetosRey ((Oh that's you!))
@NvidaNoire Hello and good to know. How are you, Lady Noire?
@AnicetosRey Hehehe that's true ;)
@AnicetosRey So does sex. Or coffee ;)
@AnicetosRey Why that? It's just dreams. I barely dream though.
@AnicetosRey You’re welcome ;)
@AnicetosRey ... Dreams “the children of an idle brain”. Nothing more or less.
@AnicetosRey There was a movie about it years ago. I'm referring to a quote Mercutio said in Romeo and Juliet. He basically describes...
@AnicetosRey I stick to Shakespeare here (did I say that?!).
Last night I dreamed I was a Valkyrie like in the old days. I died and smiled as Valhalla opened itself to me... dreams... so foolish...
I like you carrying me around. I'd carry you around otherwise too. Though it'd look hilariously funny... ;)… https://t.co/hfwBWq9Avo
#MyManAndMe #MusicMonday @Fking_Lucca https://t.co/kqKFWHiUsw https://t.co/3juLG25bMq
@leannansidhe12 @Mirmirbee Weeeell. Thank heaven and hell I'm a charming and relaxed bride... #HearMeRoar https://t.co/ATAS3TUgfJ
